website_summaries.verdict: Has a good price point for a 6-foot USB 3.0 extension cable that does what it promises.
pros: Easy to set up and use, as the cable bends nicely
You'll be able to use it a lot of different ways with 6 feet of length
Has all of the speed you'd expect to find with a USB 3.0 cable extender
cons: Has rectangular-shaped connector housings, so it may not fit in tight spaces

customer_reviews.title: Didn't drop a Mbps!
customer_reviews.text: Got this usb 3.0 to extend the computer jack for a wide usb internet adapter which was blocking my audio headphones jack. I did an online speed test with the adapter plugged into the laptop, then a speed test with the adpater plugged into the cable, both to the same host server. Perferct! It didn't drop a single Mbps. The cable is high quality, and the cord is flexible. I highly recommend UGreen cables, and will use them for any future need.
customer_reviews.author: joeb

customer_reviews.title: Very good USB 3.0 extension cable
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 3 1/2 months of use. I was using this to connect my Dell Visor (Windows Mixed Reality headset) to my PC. Yesterday the headset began to randomly lose connection. After troubleshooting drivers and cables, I determined this USB 3.0 extension cord was to blame. This cord never moves, so I'm not sure why it would fail... but it did. UPDATE: I raised this review from 2 to 4 stars for a few reasons. First, I’m not 100% sure the issue was caused by the cable. Second, this company has great customer service. Almost immediately after my previous review they contacted me and sent a new cable free of charge. That’s pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Fully compatible with Oculus Rift, FYI. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Fully compatible with Oculus Rift, FYI. I have both sensors (i have touch controllers), the HMD, and the wireless dongle running on these - zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Drago3000

customer_reviews.title: great 6' extension cable..
customer_reviews.text: Great USB 3.0 extension cable. The only issue I run into is sometimes when using the extension cable, the speed drops down to USB 2.0. If I don't use the extension cable, it always stays connected at USB 3.0 speeds. I have tried different computers and USB ports with the same results. Not sure if it is the computers USB port or the 6' length of the cable. Even at USB 2.0 speeds it still make a great extension cable.
customer_reviews.author: richard f

customer_reviews.title: Strong cable
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a sturdy cable and it worked plugging a USB flash drive into a USB hub. The cord is thicker and stiffer than most USB cables, which could be good or bad depending on your preferences. It does give it a mind of its own if you're draping the cord on your working surface. Only just got it so no feeling for how durable it is. The orientation is the same as the USB port it plugs into (the USB device will be "up" if it was "up" in the port).
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I initially used the cord for a USB hub with 4 ports. Only one of the ports worked, so I tried unplugging/replugging, restarting, etc. Upon restart, none of the ports on the hub worked. I tried using the extension to direct connect my keyboard, but that didn't work either. I replugged in my set up how I originally had it prior to the extension cord and everything works fine. Now I'm left with a dead cord. Maybe I got a one off bad item, but as it stands, I would advise anyone to go with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Not useful with mice
customer_reviews.text: Imagine wanting to extend your mouse cable. Imagine your mice buttons not being read correctly and your buttons not being able to be read in a long pressed state so that the computer thinks that one is "double clicking" instead of a "long single click". Imagine what that does in day to day computing operation or even gaming. This may be a solution for other devices, but for mice? Move along. Makes for an expensive bundling wrap or something to tie materials together I guess. Or perhaps you may choke yourself with it knowing the money you spend in cabling only for it not to work.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch Hasues

customer_reviews.title: This one works.
customer_reviews.text: Simple product - gave it 5 stars because I can't imagine it having any flaws for the one thing I bought it for. Recognizes everything you plug into it like it's the original outlet, has a nice thick cord, good coloring, etc. I bought it for my Plugable Bluetooth USB dongle for my desktop. The dongle carries a signal well, but Nintendo Switch Joycons do not. I have to have the dongle like right in front of me for the controllers to pick it up. Extension cord worked like a charm. Plus in the future, the length of this cord will let me mount it really high so that I get the best signal projection from the dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan R. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Extends the length of short cable.
customer_reviews.text: Extends the length of the cable that was included with an external hard drive. Nice, solid construction of the UGreen cable jacket. Gold plated connectors provide a tight fit. (I do not plug & unplug) Ugreen name stamped (embossed) into the connectors, so it is low profile. Great when more than one cable is plugged side by side vertically. Shipped in it's own resealable bag. Will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hind

customer_reviews.title: Great Cable for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one since I love it so much. I have one for the bed, couch and office. Great quality cable and I appreciate how this extension connection is a solid housing with no metal exposing like other competitors. USB 3.0 also make this cable future proof. My devices do charges quickly with this cable.
customer_reviews.author: Khoa Phan

customer_reviews.title: Can't use
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure my product was defective, but it did not work, extending the USB cord of my camera. Either some of the conductors were not continuous or the extra cable capacitance ruled out its use. Since I cannot determine which reason is correct I am keeping the cable rather then return it. It may work on less critical uses.
customer_reviews.author: Carleton Bergstedt

customer_reviews.title: Update: What makes it 3.0 vs 2.0?
customer_reviews.text: Original post: Thought this was the fix for a slow connection between my USB 3.0 device and 3.0 port on my computer, but doesn't seem to be any faster than my 2.0 cable. Follow up: My suspicions about this cable seem to be confirmed. If it had failed completely that would have been acceptable, but the intermittent fault in it increased until the USB drive would not display its contents in Windows. Thought it was the USB stick so I plugged it in where this cable was and everything popped right up. Gave it two stars because it worked for awhile, but not to expectations from a USB device.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J.

customer_reviews.title: Nikki's Pros and Cons of the 3ft UGREEN USB Extension Cable USB 3.0 Extender
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Well built and fair priced - Handles large USB SSDs and 2.5 inch HDDs - Good transfer rates - Firm locking connection to USB devices Cons: - Doesn't come in multi-colors I've owned dozens of USB cables but only a few can handle concurrent high-speed transfers, this 3ft UGREEN USB cable can!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Heat

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a portable ASUS USB monitor that I wanted to connect to my desktop. I needed an USB extension. The USB 2.0 extension cable, that I already had did not work. Monitor displayed nothing. After I bought this cable and connected it the monitor started to work beautifully. Very happy with the performance and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Simon G

customer_reviews.title: If you can say it they got it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase from this company for hard to find adapters,cables,OTG needs for all device protocals.If you can describe your tethering needs this place has a high quality solution for a reasonable price.Thanks really love it.As a testing has shown using Aida 64 the charge rate is almost double with these cables.Tommorow will test data speeds.
customer_reviews.author: mark arrington

customer_reviews.title: it's not to say the cable is a bad cable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cable to extend the headset on my oculus rift, it did not work for that purpose. I tried to extend a sensor on the oculus rift system, also it did not work. I have a intel 4770 3.4 GHz and a 1060 EVGA gpu. The one star rating is because it did not work for my particular purposes, it's not to say the cable is a bad cable.
customer_reviews.author: K-kidd

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to route the Anker 4 port 3.0 usb hub under my table because Anker hub only comes 2ft and it's too short. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Michixlina

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the Tesla Model 3 to split the two front USB ports
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my Tesla (Model 3). It was used to split one of the two ports at the front of the vehicle dash. One port is used mainly for the dash cams, and I split the other two ports between charging my phone and USB for music. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Oculus Rift-S tested and confirmed!
customer_reviews.text: Cable does exactly what I needed. I use this cable in combination with this DP cable; : I tried various combinations of 10' cables and none worked. The "repeater set up" shown on that blog does not work for many. THIS combo works for your Rift-S. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: SpecialK

customer_reviews.title: This is a good item with some mods !!
customer_reviews.text: IN some reviews they said that their tablet would not stay put.I ordered it any way turns out that the adjustable joints have plastic washers in them if you take them out you can lock them down tight and they wont move. I like the itrm cause you can see the screen better than the others out there. Would say buy it if you pull the washers out !!
customer_reviews.author: iridiobob

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the 64 gb usb drive to connect to my 17 Ram 1500 so it doesn't over heat. Seven hours on the road and cool to the touch. I have burned out three different usb drives directly connected to the port. Now I have music for days!
customer_reviews.author: MuddBugg

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for High-Speed Data Transfers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cable to use as an extension cord on a USB 3 hub. The hub has 2 large hard drives and a blu-ray burner connected to it, and all performed just as well with the extension cable as they did with a direct hub-to-pc connection.
customer_reviews.author: Exciter

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them:)
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to review here, they're as advertised and strait forward. They are definitely fast enough for my needs (I often transfer large files between devices) and they have no connection issues. They're built with quality, they fit well, and the reach is perfect. The only 'downside' is that the cables have quite a bit of memory and thereby aren't especially flexible, but nothing enough to cause issues.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Used for oculus extension
customer_reviews.text: I needed another couple of feet for my oculus rift, so I found this product and bought it. Not much to say, the product works great. Great accessory for the oculus to tack on another few feet of play area.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Perin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Failed in only a few months of use. However, this Company goes to great length to ensure that it's products meet their customers' expectations. On their own volition, they contacted me and offered to replace the defective product. I didn't ask them to do so, but they did and for that, I am changing my rating to 5 STARS. Thank you UGREEN.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Helped my mouse not skip anymore
customer_reviews.text: Got this so that my mouse USB was further way from my computer and base because it was skipping and flickering alot. Well did some research and this thing solved that problem. Happy with how it works now and it no longer skips!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: Nice length and well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice length cable and I like the way the connectors are made. Seem sturdier than many cables I've seen. Not a bad price either.
customer_reviews.author: stewart

customer_reviews.title: Odyssey+ needed a powered hub
customer_reviews.text: I used it to extend my VR HMD Samsung odyssey+ usb cable. It still required me to use a powered usb hub to be able to use it at that distance. That might just be my motherboard’s fault though not sending enough voltage over usb. The cable works great otherwise
customer_reviews.author: C. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: POS broke after one unplug
customer_reviews.text: Internal pins were absolutely destroyed after removing a device once. Now completely unusable. Gripped my usb way to hard, no force applied while removing but pins still fell apart. Very cheap. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great extension for USB
customer_reviews.text: Good solid product. My computer's USB speaker wire is too short to stretch behind the computer desk to the computer. This product does the deal. Good solid wire. Very sturdy. Plug it in to the desktop computer or laptop then plug the other end into your USB device. There will be no loss of signal quality. It's a reliable USB extension cable that does the job I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: It's what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This cable works well and is strong enough to hold up for my application in my work vehicle. I use it to plug in to my DC to AC converter USB connection to charge my phone and to add length to my phone charge cable.
customer_reviews.author: Cperrine

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Oculus Rift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Oculus Rift setup which needs high speed throughput on the USB channel. This extension cable works perfectly, it's allowed me to have my play area further away from the computer but there is no lag or any noticeable effect on the Rift system.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Cable didn't work replacement has to be wiggled to get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the first cable to work. The second cable has to have the male connection jiggled to get it to work. I tried it on the different ports on the computer and one on my printer and all of them had the same issue. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: PM in UT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher I needed an extension for my webcam in order to get it in the right spot for my virtual students to see the board. This cable is perfect! Nice weight and works great with my webcam!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Negron

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This extension is great! My husband took my old extension for his phone so I needed another for the bedroom. It’s super helpful to be on charge and using it while laying in bed (even though I shouldn’t) Might have to buy another one for the living room. All the plus are far and the cords aren’t long enough to be on it while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Divyesh

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two, both failed in short order.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these cables specifically for my Oculus Rift, and specifically because it says it is compatible. If it makes any difference, i was using the cable for the headset, not the sensors. The first cable worked as expected for a couple months before going bad, so I got another thinking it was a fluke. The second one died in a week. Both cables are in excellent condition still aside from not working, no wear or bending or anything like that. Anyone buying this to get a few more feet to move with their VR set-up should be warned, I definitely recommend you get something else instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cable for use with an external DVD player. It is long enough that I don't have to struggle with using the player's short cord. Front and Rear USB all within easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: 3foot cable worked with my oculus rift.
customer_reviews.text: go It to make a break out cable for my oculus rift I got the 3 foot one since my play space is not that big but getting the rift to connect from the front of my pc made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good connection to monitor
customer_reviews.text: I damaged the screen on my laptop, which was a year old. Purchased this connector to use with a stand alone monitor rather then paying a large amount for a new laptop screen. There seems to be about a 5 second delay from the laptop to the monitor, but other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ray 1

customer_reviews.title: Works with Anker (6ft) cable for Oculus Quest!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about trying this cable giving all the mixed reviews, but gave it a try anyway. I had originally bought the Anker (6ft) cable that was recommended by Oculus, but 6ft ended up being a problem. After just recieving this 6ft extension and giving it a try right a way, it worked just as good as the Anker on it's own. I am beyond happy I decided to chance it as I really didnt want to spend another $30 for a cable that may not work at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T L.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with Nintendo Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward, USB extension cord. Plugged it into my Nintendo switch docking station, then plugged a USB multi port to it. Now I have all my Wired controllers plugged in, and running as one cable to my switch.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Rios

customer_reviews.title: Did Not work for us Oculus Rift S
customer_reviews.text: Works well for added length & transfer speeds. Did not work for extending Oculus Rift S
customer_reviews.author: Karl F Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my mouse
customer_reviews.text: Gives me the extra cable I need to get my mouse down below my desk, through the back and side and back over the top to reach my docking station. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: joko

customer_reviews.title: does not work for VR headsets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cable because it says that it will work with VR headsets, it does not work with my Windows mixed reality headset. When I plug this in to my VR headset on my Asus Prime motherboard the audio is all static, If I just use the cable (built into the headset) without this extension everything works fine. I have used this brand on a few different thing in the past and they have worked out great, so good that more then a few friends are using them too now. But this extension is a no go:(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I attachd it to my DVR security camera box and the other end to the mouse to be able to change camera views from my desk across the room. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Holiday

customer_reviews.title: USB 3.0 Extension Cable 6 feet long
customer_reviews.text: Well made in China. USB 3.0 6-foot extension cable. I just realized how much faster my backups are now on my desktop PC. It’s 3-10 times faster on my external hard drive! I should have bought this a long time ago! I was using a USB 2.0 extension cable! Big mistake!
customer_reviews.author: LAJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to by this for my husband wired headset because the wire on the headset wont long enough to reach the ps4, no shortage no disconnect issues it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Poohbear86

customer_reviews.title: perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: works fantastic, gold plated for best quality, does what i need it to do perfectly, would highly recommend this extension cable for usb 3.0.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this work as an extension cord to the little itty bitty short cord that came with my new external drive, it worked even though the external drive's directions said that it wouldn't!
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: When I got an Ergotron Lift for my computer keyboard and monitor, so I could stand as well as sit at the desk, suddenly the wireless keyboard and mouse were out of range for the Microsoft USB transmitter. This little cable extender immediately solved the problem. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. I have a webcam mounted to a 32" TV I have mounted to my office wall. I couldn't reach the computer under the desk with the attached cord. This cord makes it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a snake
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on the floor in the middle of the night and assumed it was a snake. Oh baby did I ever scream. Took hours to get the kids back to sleep but it was not a snake, everything was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my teaching needs
customer_reviews.text: The length was perfect and the fit as well. I needed to buy in order to do remote teaching, and it fit my Snowball Ice Mic perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia28

customer_reviews.title: Works for some things, not for others.
customer_reviews.text: I can plug a usb drive into it and it works fine, but for some reason if I try to plug my anker usb hub into it, the keyboard and mouse attached to the hub don't work. Unfortunately I don't really know enough about these things to tell if the problem is with the cable itself or with my computer's usb 3.0 drivers or something else entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Find if you dont want a hub
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly! now I can extend my usb 3.0 from rear of pc to top of desk and clean look. transfer rates did not change from plugging directly to rear PC usb 3.0 port or using the cable extender.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: sturdy cable with just enough flex
customer_reviews.text: Usb 3 ports are on the back of the computer so this is handy to have one up front. Usb 3 is much faster so this is a great way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wickert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This extension cable works perfectly and solves the problem I had. It was the right length to us to move my USB port on my work desk to a point that better suited the placement of my phone while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This USB extension cable is just what I needed. I had a product which came with a very short cable. This made it difficult to use. The extension allows me to move freely without being closely tied to an outlet. I have already found several other uses for the cord. This was a great find.
customer_reviews.author: NanaB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 3.0 for Oculus Rift Sensors
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for the Oculus Rift Sensor closest to my PC. During the Rift setup, it read as USB 3.0. I am very satisfied. The build quality seems great and you can't beat it for the price. My other two sensors need 15+ ft cables, so I went with these
customer_reviews.author: Glee

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use it as USB extention on multiple sevices. It fits perfectly between the grooves of the PS4 if you have a bulky flashdrive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cable
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed with quality materials. Male connection is very good; female connection is a bit on the snug side. Use it to extend connection to USB 3 devices near the keyboard so I don't have to reach into the rear or underside of the PC to attach a device such as a USB stick.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: The extension cable is made with quality material. It's not flimsy like some of the lower quality cables you may encounter. It works great and I haven't had any problems thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: For those pesky times you either: 1) have a built-in cord that’s too short or 2) you didn’t plan your setup well enough and ran into problem 1). Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only works on ONE of the USB port
customer_reviews.text: I bought this USB extension to extend my Logitech Wireless Keyboard / Mouse Receiver. I connect one end to the Receiver and the other end to 1 of 4 USB 3 Port at the back of my desktop (connected directly to the motherboard). This USB 3 only works with ONE of the port. When I tried to connect to any of the other 3 ports, the device driver couldn't be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fernando

customer_reviews.title: It did not work with iPhone Cable
customer_reviews.text: The connector is too small, It did not fit in my iPhone cable, to unplugged my cable from the extension cable was almost impossible, I damage my iPhone cable
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Muro

customer_reviews.title: best usb extension
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this cable , well constructed , good price, 3.0 speed . very happy with it ..
customer_reviews.author: TAZ-MAN-TIM

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment, good price, prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: I needed a USB 3.0 extension cable and this one is perfect. Good value and very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Herschel Knapp

customer_reviews.title: All of the stores I went to had like none of these in stock
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. All of the stores I went to had like none of these in stock! It's really long too, for what I use it for. I use it to connect my ps4 controller or for my wired keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm just using it to hook it up to fan reaching the back seat to cool off our baby during the summer works great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT fof phone charging, even if it seems like it is
customer_reviews.text: Not a proper charging cable, super slow, not a real data cable. Buy something better, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Oculus Rift to have a place to connect the headset rather than from behind the computer. This works well for that and to extend it a bit more. Very satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth & Riki Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Super Useful, and works well
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, and the quality is pretty top notch for the price. I've been using them to connect devices to my pc, and extend controller cables to my ps3, and it works flawlessly. 10/10 would recommend again.
customer_reviews.author: cameronn

customer_reviews.title: Very good cable, not dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well made cable - much better quality than I was expecting - especially for $5.99 - but I think any price under $10 would be fair. I'm using it to extend the length of my keyboard cord, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Inger

customer_reviews.title: Great extension cable for my backup drive.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I had an external backup drive that came with a useless two foot cable I use this cable to extend that so I don't have to move the drive at all.
customer_reviews.author: John L Morlock

customer_reviews.title: It breaks really easily.
customer_reviews.text: Its either weak on the front or back end. I have never had this issue with another USB extender before. I have no Idea why. I just assumed it was my device (PC) port not working. Tried it with another PC and same issue. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: 6k911

customer_reviews.title: Good extension
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to so far. I am using it on our smart TV so I don't have fumble around to trying to plug photo thumb drives into the back of the TV. Cord is plenty long
customer_reviews.author: RV guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to give me a little more freedom from my desk while working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: " PLUGED IN "
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered, The play back quality is great especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered. Exactly as anticipated. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: USB 3.0 extension cable. Good quality, good price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jack21

customer_reviews.title: great usb extension cable
customer_reviews.text: great usb extension cable . the cable is decently thick and holds its shape well for its price it is great
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my security camera that i needed to extend longer, i recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Use with TV
customer_reviews.text: I use this for plugging in USB drives in the back of my Samsung tv so I don’t have to I mount the tv from the wall to switch out drives. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy gurdy usb cable
customer_reviews.text: what else can I say? its a thick sturdy cable that allows me to quick plug my devices to my mac pro without me bending awkwardly to reach the port. actually planning to order a few more for the office to save some backs! they'll thank me later :)
customer_reviews.author: WarrenH

customer_reviews.title: Great for extending my ps4 controller
customer_reviews.text: Use it to extend my ps4 controller it works great never any problems

product_meta.title: UGREEN USB Extension Cable USB 3.0 Extender Type A Male to Female Data Transfer Cord 5Gbps for Playstation, Xbox, Oculus VR, USB Flash Drive, Card Reader, Hard Drive, Keyboard, Printer, Camera (6ft)
product_meta.description:
Size:6ftUSB 3.0 High Speed Extender Cable and Usage
- This cable lets you extend USB connections by 3 feet between your computer or Mac and USB devices thereby giving you the liberty to move away from your desktop while using your USB devices
- You can connect USB devices such as Oculus VR, Playstation, Xbox, Card Reader, USB Flash Drive, Hard Drive, Mouse, Keyboard, Printer, Scanner, Camera and most popular USB devices remotely with this cable
- The cable features a Type Male A connector on one end that plugs into your computer and a Type Female A connector on the other that connects to the USB cable you wanna extend

Key Features
- Fast Data Transfer: Super Speed USB 3.0 data transfer rate at up to 5 Gbps, 10x faster than USB 2.0.
- Premium Shielding: Corrosion resistant tin-plated bare cooper conductors, gold plated connectors and foil with braid shielding keeps the maximum conductivity and minimize data loss for the extension process.
- Gold-Plated Connectors: The repeater cable features gold-plated connectors that resist corrosion for signal purity and durable with more than 10000 times plug.

Universal Compatibility
No drivers required on any OS, including Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Chrome OS, etc.

Technical Specs
- Connector Type: USB Type A Male, USB Type A Female
- Cable Length: 1 meter/3 feet
- Transfer Rate: 5 Gbps

Package
1* 3ft Ugreen USB 3.0 Repeater Extension Cable
feature_bullets: Easy Reach Extension Cable: Ugreen USB 3.0 extension cable offers an easy and inexpensive way to extends your USB connection to the computer or Mac by 6ft, for use with Oculus VR, Playstation, Xbox, USB Flash Drive, Hard Drive, Card Reader, Mouse, Keyboard, Printer, Scanner, Camera and other USB computer peripherals.

5Gbps Data Transfer: This USB extender cord supports high speed USB 3.0 data transfer rate up to 5Gbps - 10X faster than USB 2.0 (480 Mbps), which allows you to transfer HD movies or files in just seconds, when your host is equipped with USB 3.0 port. Also backward compatible with USB 2.0, 1.1 and 1.0 (speed limited by USB bus). Plug& Play on universal system, no driver required.

Super Performance: The USB male to female cable features corrosion-resistant tin-plated bare copper conductors, gold plated connector and foil & braid shielding that provides protection against interference from EMI/RFI signals thus enabling high performance.

Flexible & Durable: With metal wire braid inside, the usb A cable extender is flexible and resistant to pull and drag. The gold-plated connectors can bear more than 10000 times plug. The PVC case is anti-abrasive.

Extend & Protect USB Port: With this USB 3 extension cord, no need to squeeze yourself to the back of the TV or desktop to connect usb disk or other usb peripherals anymore,you can extend the USB port to a more convenient and easy reach location.In addition,this usb type a extension cable is perfect for protecting the USB sockets of your devices from repeatedly plug and unplug. WHAT YOU GET: 1* Ugreen USB 3.0 Repeater Extension Cable.
